welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Bardmoor, known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and executive flights, offering a luxurious and efficient travel experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whitted Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Whitted Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mac Dill AFB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Mac Dill AFB Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Peter O'Knight Airport serves all commercial and private flights.
